00013 #include <Qt>
00014 #include <QLabel>
00015 #include <QPixmap>
00016 #include <QPushButton>
00017 #include <QDialogButtonBox>
00018 #include <QGridLayout>
00019 
00020 #include "stkyesno.h"
00021 
00022 StkYesNo::StkYesNo(const QPixmap & pixmap, const QString & text, QWidget *parent) :
00023     StkWidget(parent)
00024 {
00025     // create widgets
00026     // main icon
00027     mIcon = new QLabel(this);
00028     mIcon->setPixmap(pixmap);
00029     // main text message
00030     mText = new QLabel(text, this);
00031     // end session button
00032     mEndButton = new QPushButton("End",this);
00033     // yes/no button box
00034     mYesNoBox = new QDialogButtonBox(QDialogButtonBox::Yes|QDialogButtonBox::No,Qt::Horizontal,this);
00035 
00036     // layout widgets
00037     // grid layout 3x2
00038     QGridLayout *grid = new QGridLayout(this);
00039     // main icon topleft
00040     grid->addWidget(mIcon,0,0,Qt::AlignLeft);
00041     // end session button topright
00042     grid->addWidget(mEndButton,0,1,Qt::AlignRight|Qt::AlignTop);
00043     // main text message middle left
00044     grid->addWidget(mText,1,0,1,2,Qt::AlignHCenter);
00045     // yes/no button box bottom left
00046     grid->addWidget(mYesNoBox,2,0,Qt::AlignHCenter);
00047 
00048     // connect signals
00049     connect(mEndButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SIGNAL(endSession()));
00050     connect(mYesNoBox, SIGNAL(accepted()), this, SIGNAL(accepted()));
00051     connect(mYesNoBox, SIGNAL(rejected()), this, SIGNAL(rejected()));
00052 }
00053 
00054 StkYesNo::~StkYesNo()
00055 {
00056     close();
00057     delete mText;
00058     delete mIcon;
00059     delete mEndButton;
00060     delete mYesNoBox;
00061 }
